bibdata.title: Draft Standard Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in IEEE Std. 2600&trade;-2008 Operational Environment C
Draft Standard Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in IEEE Std. 2600&trade;-2008 Operational Environment C
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P2600.3/D47a, Oct 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Standard for a Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in a public-facing environment in which document security is not guaranteed, but access control and usage accounting are important to the operator of the environment. A retail copy center, public library, Internet cafÂ¿, and hotel business center are typical applications of this environment. This environment will be known as "Operational Environment C."

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
